tweets.text:
If you live in a flood risk area you should be prepared for #flooding.
This #FloodActionWeek we want to make you aware that you can:
- Sign up for flood warnings
- Make a simple flood plan 
- Know what to do in a flood
Find out how at: https://t.co/ZEHl74ryiJ
#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/cJaWeSQXrV

Flooding is devastating, , but there are small steps you can take to keep you and your family safe and help protect your home or business.  Check your #Floodrisk and sign-up for free . To find out more visit https://t.co/29saU23JrY #FloodActionweek #PrepareActSurvive. üåäüè† https://t.co/6IWfitUqei

Obstructions that restrict the flow of a river may increase the potential for flooding to nearby properties.

Our Field Teams asses reports and remove large blockages like this one in the River Skerne.

#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware https://t.co/TFCtOIamEQ

Our work with @EnvAgencyYNE at Carrshield will save an important reminder of Britain‚Äôs industrial past and stop pollution. It‚Äôs part of the Water and Abandoned Metal Mines programme, funded by @DefraWater and @northeastlep. You can read more üëâ https://t.co/gxP79SLWgh üëà https://t.co/ifbmNnpNxS

tweets.text:
Can you guess what the number 1 cause of death during flooding is?
#FloodActionWeek @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyYNE @EnvAgencyNW @itvcalendar @manalilukha https://t.co/SbOZLESmn1

Check out the 5 things you can do this #FloodActionWeek to be better prepared for a flood.

Take action to protect yourself, your family and your home now. üëá

https://t.co/PzDbHFZ82f

#PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/MygPPn6XQu

@WaterUK @NaturalEngland @Natures_Voice @WoodlandTrust @WildlifeTrusts @YorkshireWater @AnglianWater @EnvAgency @NorthumbrianH2O Meanwhile in the real world here's what's actually happening to our rivers and the environment.

https://t.co/WwTAxC65iv

Sadly approval to desecrate the Stonehenge World Heritage Landscape at Stonehenge may be about to happen & will ultimately trigger the most monumental waste of money on a scheme that will not serve purpose in any sense. But first a judicial review will take place. https://t.co/TPyLA1Azha

It's #FloodActionWeek 
Would you know how to protect yourself and your possessions during a flood? Find out what you can do to prepare https://t.co/oqwD0mWwJP
#PrepareActSurvive 
@EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/nWlTyRHAGg

Access to embankment in #Burton-upon-Trent is now open as part of ¬£30m project to better protect 4,500 homes & 1,000 businesses #flooding

The path through Toad Hole nature reserve is also open & the project should be completed next Spring #flood details  https://t.co/6kSZ8Gu3cQ https://t.co/hoyvmzntD7

There are over 200,000 properties at risk of tidal flooding around the Humber, some of these surprisingly far inland. 

Don‚Äôt assume it‚Äôs not you. 

Check your risk! https://t.co/OVBXgMPY7J

#PrepareActSurvive #Floodaware https://t.co/50WwWdexix

tweets.text:
Flooding can be devastating. It can harm your health and well-being, damage your property, and put lives at risk.

Learn what to do in a flood üëâ https://t.co/zYtctBt6eE

#FloodActionWeek #PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/ivuLRz8u7Z
@RussellB1ggs @rivercide_live @WindrushWasp Steady with the camera action Russell ü§£ü§£

@WildTroutTrust @EnvAgencyMids @DerbysDerwRiver @JackPerksPhoto @fishmigration @AST_Salmon @EnvAgency @BiodiversityEA @ProfJGrey @Theo_Pike @reelrivers @PaulNGaskell @super_flyguy @RobMungovan Great work Tim! Looking forward to seeing the end result üêüüêüüêü

Calling all Shiplake residents! The Thames Farm development saga will get coverage on @BBCSouthNews today at 6.30pm. Please tune in and also visit  https://t.co/CZxLCwGOEW to view the local petition on stopping a local environmental disaster. @henleystandard @EnvAgency

Want to attend our Environment Conference üåébut not an IWater member? If you work for any of the following: @EnvAgency, @SouthernWater, @SouthWestWater, @CCWvoice, @Waterwise, @FutureWaterAsso, @WaterREast you're entitled to attend for a discounted fee! https://t.co/gC2gLAqcjc https://t.co/4rSvlnVtqy

Would you know what to do in a #flood?

If you live in a flood risk area, make sure you're prepared and ready to act if a flood hit. 

Take a look at the @EnvAgency's advice here üëâ https://t.co/WF3X8gGfU6 

#PrepareActSurvive #flooding #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/NyQw87YOsm
Anyone recall @LoveWaterUK, you remember, the @EnvAgency led campaign that was going to save our chalk streams?

Officers have been installing solar paneled cameras at two of our reservoirs.

The cameras allow us to see how full each reservoir is, if the gates are blocked with debris, what the water levels in the channels are and lots more.  (1/2) #Flood #Water https://t.co/LagfTRqAbQ

Access to embankment in #Burton-upon-Trent is now open as part of ¬£30m project to better protect 4,500 homes & 1,000 businesses #flooding

The path through Toad Hole nature reserve is also open & the project should be completed next Spring #flood details  https://t.co/6kSZ8Gu3cQ https://t.co/hoyvmzntD7

We love to see Natural Flood Management in action!

#NFM forms part of the mosaic of measures which can help reduce the risk of #flooding. By working with @moorsforfuture we can create more of these schemes & use our natural habitats to build up flood resilience

#FloodActionWeek https://t.co/TerjQekFBP

tweets.text: Up in the fells today transporting timber for the next phase in our landscape scale #nfm project for @SCRiversTrust The project, above Staveley in the #LakeDistrict is funded by @EnvAgencyNW Massive thanks to @lakelandfarmvc for their support which has made this project possible. https://t.co/2ZQvsfRspV

Sutton Harbour Lock is a strategically important flood defence protecting 300+ properties and businesses around the Barbican. In Oct we used specialist divers to carry out essential maintenance and a thorough inspection ahead of winter. #PrepareActSurvive

Its flood Action week. We‚Äôre encouraging everyone to check their risk and know what to do in a flood. https://t.co/4F9BadnblZ

At the EA we prepare year round building and maintaining flood defences, sometimes underwater, like here at Sutton harbour lock #Plymouth https://t.co/dMUOJp48KJ

@MarkGale @EnvAgency @XRMerton @XRSutton @KingstonXR @XRCroydon @WimbledonNews @suttonguardian @ThisisRiverside @stephen_menon @EveningStandard The Volatile Organic Compounds must be the üêÇüí© from councillors who say it's '99% steam' ü§î @SuttonLibDems @cwclp @SuttonTories @suttongreens @XRSutton

With Croydon Council in meltdown, seems a good day for the #SLWP Beddington Incinerator üè≠ to sneak out another notice of @EnvAgency series of permit breaches.

üóìOctober emissions published this morning.

Breaches inc:
  ‚ò†Ô∏èVOC Volatile Organic Compounds
  ‚ò†Ô∏èCO Carbon Monoxide https://t.co/GfpjUdU0GN

We're working with @EnvAgency to deliver #NFM flood management techniques, slowing the flow of water from the hills to reduce flooding, across catchments in @EnvAgencyNW - including the construction of 200 mini-dams in Stalybridge #FloodActionWeek 

https://t.co/sNySGMrwcM https://t.co/NKOe0XYNGp

A week of striking stats... There are 152 @EnvAgencyNW  #flood warning areas in #Lancashire. 75 of these have under 50% sign up from those able to receive them! Pls do sign up  https://t.co/3Z355LqJ1W & spread the word #PrepareActSurvive #FloodActionWeek https://t.co/jihX3Rv4Ij

Work has begun for the Hidden Heritage Secret Streams project, in partnership with DCRT. 

NFM measures are being delivered on farmland alongside the river Rother upstream of Chesterfield. Measures include floodplain scrapes and sowing herbal leys.

#NFM #EAEnvironmentProgramme https://t.co/7xsthQSHUT

@river_usk @GawRagbag @EnvAgency @NatResWales @CommonsEAC @WGEnviroAgri @Feargal_Sharkey @theriverstrust @AfonyddCymru Hiüëã
It's the #RiverWitham here I flow through #LINCOLNSHIRE I'd just like to say that I'm in a bloody diabolical state!ü§ï I'm pissing #pollution & shitting Stinky #sewage üí© I've only a few small fish cos' they die real early-Please help me! please hel p me, h el  pm e  e     e https://t.co/VYMHRe8wJu
@RosieWoodroffe Rosie you should read @Feargal_Sharkey tweets about water companies‚Äô sewage releases permitted by @EnvAgency - that‚Äôs where mink might pick up viruses

If you need a reason to pledge to @rivercide_live for the documentary @frannyarmstrong & @GeorgeMonbiot are making. Watch this. Our rivers are dying. Our rivers need our help. Head over to the rivercide page and click their link.
#sewage https://t.co/yhM6CRJklB

Nature-based solutions are central to our #Routemap2030.

Our #NetZero plan will see the restoration of 20,000 hectares of owned peatland & grassland, as well as the planting of 11 million trees.

Find out more: https://t.co/kbbjxMluwT https://t.co/a0s0MnERMP

@EnvAgencySE @4SheilaHancock @GylesB1 @spungoldtv @MariaHerlihyEA @4Viewers @BarryRussellEA You guys are great to watch......great banter and I fell about laughing when Sheila lost it....'You are on the ground, you can stand up!' Hilarious. It's a brilliant show, full of laughter and fun....I'll be watching again! By the way....Sheila...well done on the rowing!!!!!!!!!

Great to see survey work starting on the latest phase of the Rotherham Renaissance Flood Alleviation Scheme. This ¬£20 million project extends along a 5km stretch of the River Don through #Templeborough, the town centre and #Parkgate areas of #Rotherham. https://t.co/NCyt8atUoA https://t.co/35dvw3ld08

Interesting problem. Why would wild living mink in uk have a strain from Denmark? Wild living mink are likely to have minimal contact with people, is catching them to test them more likely to give them covid than leaving them alone? https://t.co/bOo2mrPbGQ
